description: These puzzles are designed for babies and little kids with the a lot of pictures from the kids world:  Animals: wild and farm animals  Tools: work tools of different professions   Vehicles: cars, airplanes, train, ships and more   Toys: cars and different toys from the toddlerss world  Fruits & vegetables  Music instruments  The application has a fun activity of panda dressing by which the small child will learn to locate the different dressing parts in their places. And he will not get bored while learning with us.  Features: 1. Simple & intuitive child-friendly interface for babies & little kids 2. Universal app for all phones and tablets 3. 11 different languages and pronunciations - English, Arabic, Dutch, French, German, 4. Italian, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Swedish, Turkish. 5. Hundreds of puzzle pieces in 6 different categories. 6. Alphabet and numbers. 7. Animals: wild, farm, dinosaurs and sea creatures. 8. Fruits and vegetables. 9. Easy navigation between puzzles 10. Easy movement of puzzle pieces across screen  Drag & drop animations Balloon animation & happy cheering after each correctly solved puzzle. Activity: objects pickup from a tree.   We, at Forqan Smart Tech, have always sought to provide the best for your children through applications designed, and directed each age group separately, our belief in the feature each evolutionary stage passes by your son, but in order to lend life skills and the mentality to learn and grow and play correctly and properly, and to communicate with his peers and the environment surrounding it.  Baby Puzzles - Animals, Fruits & Cars is available in 11 languages and contains.
